backgrounds.name: Acolyte
backgrounds.description: Raised within a temple or religious community, you’re devoted to your faith and ready to offer counsel or healing.

feature.name: Shelter of the Faithful
feature.description: You can find safe haven and support among other believers, often in temples or religious communities.

backgrounds.name: Charlatan
backgrounds.description: A cunning con artist who uses charm and trickery to manipulate others and pull off scams.

feature.name: False Identity
feature.description: You’ve crafted a second identity complete with supporting documentation and acquaintances, which can help you blend into different circles.

backgrounds.name: Criminal
backgrounds.description: With a shady past, you’re comfortable in the underbelly of society and know how to navigate its hidden networks.

feature.name: Criminal Contact
feature.description: You have a reliable contact in the criminal underworld who can provide information or assistance when needed.

backgrounds.name: Entertainer
backgrounds.description: Born to perform, you live for the applause and thrive on being the center of attention.

feature.name: By Popular Demand
feature.description: You can always find a place to perform, earn a little coin, and get food and lodging wherever you go.

backgrounds.name: Folk Hero
backgrounds.description: A champion of the people, you’ve earned the admiration of your community by standing up against injustice or oppression.

feature.name: Rustic Hospitality
feature.description: Common folk will often rally to your aid and offer shelter or assistance, recognizing you as one of their own.

backgrounds.name: Guild Artisan
backgrounds.description: As a skilled craftsman or merchant, you’re part of a larger network of professionals and share in both its prestige and responsibilities.

feature.name: Guild Membership
feature.description: Your membership in a respected guild means you can call on fellow members for help or information.

backgrounds.name: Hermit
backgrounds.description: A life of solitude has led you to profound insights—whether spiritual, natural, or arcane—that set you apart from society.

feature.name: Discovery
feature.description: During your time in seclusion, you uncovered a secret or made an unexpected discovery that could have major implications.

backgrounds.name: Noble
backgrounds.description: Born into wealth and influence, you carry the weight (and benefits) of a high social standing, with all the responsibilities that come with it.

feature.name: Position of Privilege
feature.description: Your noble birth opens doors; you’re afforded respect, and high society is more likely to assist you.

backgrounds.name: Outlander
backgrounds.description: A survivor of the wild, you’re at home in the wilderness and have learned to live off the land far from civilization’s comforts.

feature.name: Wanderer
feature.description: You have an excellent memory for natural terrain and can always find food and fresh water for yourself and your companions.

backgrounds.name: Sage
backgrounds.description: A dedicated scholar, your insatiable curiosity drives you to uncover ancient secrets and forgotten lore.

feature.name: Researcher
feature.description: When you’re trying to recall or find obscure lore, you often know where to turn—even if you don’t immediately know the answer.

backgrounds.name: Sailor
backgrounds.description: A seasoned mariner, you’ve braved the unpredictable seas and learned the ways of life aboard a ship.

feature.name: Ship’s Passage
feature.description: When you need to travel by sea, you can often secure free passage on a vessel, provided you can offer something in return.

backgrounds.name: Soldier
backgrounds.description: A disciplined veteran of military service, you’re no stranger to the rigors of combat and the structure of an army.

feature.name: Military Rank
feature.description: Your rank in the military garners respect; fellow soldiers and even superiors may be inclined to assist you.

backgrounds.name: Urchin
backgrounds.description: A streetwise survivor, your early life on the hard city streets taught you to be resourceful and quick on your feet.

feature.name: City Secrets
feature.description: Having grown up on the streets, you know the secret passages and shortcuts of urban environments like the back of your hand.
